author: Barjees bhat
text: No matter how close you are to someone ;at some certain point of life there will be misunderstandings somehow somewhere in between so instead of ignoring them , ask for permission to discuss the situation otherwise these mere ignorant things  really end up in messing everything .

author: Barjees bhat
text: If he/she is not real with you,he/she is not worth keeping.

author: Barjees bhat
text: It’s quite fun to observe someone who acts nice to you on your face but behind backstabs you and you know their reality .🙃
